body.p: The Board considered whether the definition of a ‘business’, as defined in IFRS 3 Business Combinations, would be helpful in distinguishing between a joint venture and a joint operation. Because a ‘business’ can be found in all types of joint arrangement, the Board decided not to pursue this approach.
